events.title: FT0 HV and CS configs fine-tuned for +0.2T
events.text_preview:
With the target FT0 gain of 14 ADC ch/MIP, the preliminary HV and CS configs resulted in the spread in gain betwen 11 and 16 ADC ch/MIP.

events.title: New FT0 HV config set default for +0.2T
events.text_preview:
It's the first update of the +0.2T HV config since the start of RUN3, with ageing corrections derived from 0.0T data.
Detector has never run at +0.2T, so it will be fine-tuned once the beam is availa...

events.title: FT0 HV config adjusted for the high rates - set as default for 0.5T
events.text_preview:

- from: `HV_CS_05T_pos_2022_06_21`
- to `HV-05T-pos-220922`

events.title: FT0 0.0T HV config updated
events.text_preview:
The following changes were saved to the HV-0T-220915 recipe, which is currently the default one:

FTC-A4: 1266 V -> 1191 V / 250 uA
FTC-A5: 1261 V -> 1252 V / 273 uA
